Name: LaserShotz
About the game: LaserShotz is an online PvP competitive arena shooter! Compete for the best rating on the leaderboards! Features: - Fast paced, skill based gameplay - Quick Play (Quickly find a match to play) - Custom Rooms (Create your own custom match or find one in the room list) - Ranked Play (Queue 1v1 or 2v2: for registered users only) - See your ranking on the leaderboard (registered users only) - Choose from 4 weapons - Choose from 2 arenas - Custom Keybinds
Meta Title: LaserShotz: Apr 21, 2021, XcryptGames and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on LaserShotz? Check out the release date (Apr 21, 2021), developer insights from XcryptGames, and a complete game summary.
